modal.sub_1: We have received your responses and will be updating you on your email shortly.
modal.sub_2: Please note that we will be using the information you provided to personalized your investment experience and provide you with relevant insights and recommendations.
modal.sub_3: If you need to make any changes to your information, please
modal.horizon_para_1: Modern portfolio theory (MPT) is an investment strategy based on the idea that risk-averse investors can construct portfolio to optimize or maximizing expected return for a given level of market risk, emphasizing that risk is an inherent part of higher reward.
modal.horizon_para_2: According to MPT, a portfolio frontier, also known as an efficient frontier, is a set of portfolios that maximizes expected returns for each level of standard deviation (risk). A typical portfolio frontier is illustrated below:
